00028 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00029 {
00030   createinfo(argc, argv);
00031 
00032   /* enough arguments ? */
00033 
00034   if (argc < 2) {
00035     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] mcstate"
00036             "\n   -o OMEGA       Oscillator constant [MeV]"
00037             "\n   -n NMAX        up to NMAX excitations"
00038             "\n   -N NINT        use NINT points for theta integration"
00039             "\n   -a             show also proton and neutron occupations"
00040             "\n   -A             show all eigenstates\n", argv[0]);
00041     exit(-1);

00044   int all=0;

00055 
00056   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "Aao:n:N:")) != -1)
00057     switch (c) {
00058     case 'a':
00059       totalonly = 0;
00060       break;
00061     case 'o':
00062       omega = atof(optarg)/hbc;
00063       break;
00064     case 'n':
00065       nmax = atoi(optarg);
00066       break;
00067     case 'N':
00068       nint = atoi(optarg);
00069       break;
00070     case 'A':
00071       all=1;
00072       break;
00073     }

00075   char* mcstatefile = argv[optind];

00084 
00085   readMulticonfigfile(mcstatefile, &mbfile, &P, &Q, &S, &E, &n);
00086 
00087   int a,b; 
00088 
00089   if (!nint)
00090     nint = 2*nmax;
00091 
00092   ShellOccupationsPara par = {
00093     omega : omega,
00094     nmax  : nmax,
00095     nint  : nint
00096   };
00097 
00098   initOpShellOccupations(&par);
00099 
00100   void* occupationsme[n*n]; 
00101 
00102   for (b=0; b<n; b++)   
00103     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00104       occupationsme[a+b*n] = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpShellOccupations);
00105     }
00106 
00107   // read or calculate matrix elements
00108   for (b=0; b<n; b++)
00109     for (a=0; a<n; a++) {
00110       if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], &P, 
00111                                     &OpShellOccupations, S[a], S[b], 
00112                                     occupationsme[a+b*n])) {
00113         calcprojectedMBME(&P, &OpShellOccupations, &Q[a], &Q[b], 
00114                           S[a], S[b], occupationsme[a+b*n]);
00115         writeprojectedMBMEtoFile(mbfile[a], mbfile[b], &P, 
00116                                  &OpShellOccupations, S[a], S[b], 
00117                                  occupationsme[a+b*n]);
00118       }
00119     }
00120 
00121 
00122   if (hermit) {
00123     hermitizeprojectedMBME(&P, &OpShellOccupations, occupationsme, n);
00124   }
00125 
00126   fprintf(stderr, "calculate expectation values\n");
00127 
00128   // calculate expectation values
00129   void* occupationsexp = initprojectedVector(&P, &OpShellOccupations, n);
00130   calcexpectprojectedMBME(&P, &OpShellOccupations, occupationsme, S, &E, occupationsexp);
00131 
00132

00138 
00139   snprintf(tostrip, 255, ".states");

00141            stripstr(mcstatefile, tostrip), hbc*omega);
00142   if (!(outfp = fopen(outfile, "w"))) {
00143     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", outfile);
00144     goto cleanup;
